name: Link the crew
description:
Submission to the GMTK 2021

Made with Unity. Available for :

  • Windows
  • Browser (use fullscreen)

Control the character with Up, Down, Right and Left.

  • Escape to Pause & Exit.

Assets:

  • The majority of the art was done during the Jam. Some tiles (stone walls in level 2) come from "dungeon,-tileset-ii" by 0x72 (https://0x72.itch.io/dungeontileset-ii?download)
  • Music is "Action Theme by FoolBoyMedia (https://freesound.org/people/FoolBoyMedia/sounds/231254/). And more importantly, the "Ninja" sound by Igor1998 (https://freesound.org/people/Igor1998/sounds/391286/)
